column.name: trs_cod
column.remarks: 交易类型，00-一般消费,01-预借现金,12-预借现金退货,20-一般消费退货,60-还款及费用

column.name: over_time
column.remarks: 是否逾期,true-逾期 false未逾期 ,默认false

column.name: approved_dead_line_date
column.remarks: 商务卡审核通过期限日期

column.name: used
column.remarks: 商务卡消费是否已被生成费用

column.name: expense_created_type
column.remarks: 商务卡费用生成方式 1001商务卡池 1002其他方式

column.name: rate
column.remarks: 持有币种A对兑换币种B的汇率

column.name: source
column.remarks: 汇率来源【欧行ECB 、手动更新MANUAL】

column.name: vendor_status
column.remarks: 供应商状态（编辑中, 审批中,审批拒绝, 审批通过,禁止）方正启用

column.name: vendor_bank_status
column.remarks: 供应商银行账号状态（编辑中, 审批中,审批拒绝, 审批通过,禁止）方正启用

changeSet.author: zhipeng.chen
changeSet.sql: UPDATE sys_parameter_values SET parameter_code = 'DATA_AUTHORITY' where parameter_value_code = 'Y'; UPDATE sys_parameter_values SET parameter_code = 'DATA_AUTHORITY' where parameter_value_code = 'N';

changeSet.author: zhipeng.chen
changeSet.sql: insert into sys_parameter_setting( id, parameter_level, tenant_id, parameter_id, parameter_value_id, created_date, last_updated_date) select p.id, '2001', 0, p.id, pv.id, ${now}, ${now} from sys_parameter p LEFT JOIN sys_parameter_values pv on pv.parameter_code = p.parameter_code and pv.paramete_default_value = '1' left join sys_parameter_module pm on p.module_code = pm.module_code left join sys_para_module_status pms on pm.module_code = pms.module_code

createTable.remarks: 地点定义级别分配地点表
地点定义级别多语言表
